my favorite food is steak cooked well done.

I like to watch astronomy documentaries and read about space.

content.text: Nice to meet you too! I'm (name), what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play sports with my family, watch astronomy documentaries, and read about space.
Those all sound like really fun hobbies! I love to go horseback riding whenever I can, and I love listening to my favorite music from my childhood.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to try horseback riding, but I've never had the chance.
You should definitely try it! It's so much fun! And what's your favorite music from your childhood?
I love listening to the Backstreet Boys and NSYNC.
Oh my gosh! Me too! They were my favorite bands when I was growing up!
I know, right?! They were so good!
I'm so glad we have something in common!
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who likes the same things you do.
Absolutely! I'm sure we'll be friends for a long time!
